parameters.name: MaxResult
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 50. Maximum value: 1000.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query.

parameters.name: PolicyIds
parameters.description: The ID of a tag policy. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query.

parameters.name: PolicyNames
parameters.description: The name of a tag policy. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Set the value to cn-shanghai.

parameters.name: UserType
parameters.description:
The mode of the Tag Policy feature. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query. Valid values:

*   USER: single-account mode
*   RD: multi-account mode

For more information about the modes of the Tag Policy feature, see [Modes of the Tag Policy feature](~~417434~~).

>  The value of this parameter is not case-sensitive.
